# architect-fees-be

Belgian architect fee calculator based on official BRADA methodology.

## Purpose
Calculate professional architect fees (honoraires) from surface area and construction costs using the formula from the BRADA study (Belgian Research on Architects' Design Activities).

## Core Function
calculateHonoraires(surface, constructionCost, options?)

Parameters:
- surface: Building surface in m²
- constructionCost: Net construction cost in € (excluding VAT)
- options.costPerHour: Hourly rate (default: 60€)
- options.projectType: EW|MW|SH|IL|PG|BU|ON (default: MW)
- options.buildingType: NB|VB (default: VB)

Returns:
- hoursPerM2: Hours per m² coefficient
- hoursFromSurface: Total hours from surface calculation
- hoursPer10000Euro: Hours per €10,000 coefficient
- hoursFromCost: Total hours from cost calculation
- averageHours: Average of both approaches
- honoraireMoyen: Final fee in euros

## Project Types
- EW: Single-family home (Eénsgezinswoning / Maison unifamiliale)
- MW: Multi-family building (Meergezinswoning / Immeuble à appartements)
- SH: Social housing (Sociale Huisvesting / Logement social)
- IL: Industrial/Logistics (Industrieel/Logistiek / Industriel/Logistique)
- PG: Public building (Publiek Gebouw / Bâtiment public)
- BU: Exceptional/Special (Buitengewoon / Exceptionnel)
- ON: Research/Other (Onderzoek/Overig / Recherche/Autre)

## Building Types
- NB: New construction (Nieuwbouw / Construction neuve)
- VB: Renovation (Verbouwing / Rénovation)

## Formula
Hours per m² = c × surface^d
Hours from surface = surface × hoursPerM²
Hours per €10,000 = e × cost^f (or linear for MW+VB)
Hours from cost = cost × hoursPer10000 / 10,000
Average hours = (hoursFromSurface + hoursFromCost) / 2
Honoraire = averageHours × costPerHour

## Example
For 2300m² renovation at €3,000,000:
- hoursPerM2 ≈ 1.60
- hoursFromSurface = 3682
- hoursFromCost = 3480
- averageHours = 3581
- honoraireMoyen ≈ €214,860 (at 60€/hour)

## Links
- npm: https://www.npmjs.com/package/architect-fees-be
- GitHub: https://github.com/vanmarkic/ferme-du-temple/tree/main/packages/architect-fees
- Homepage: https://lafermedutemple.be/architect-fees
- Original study: https://archimath.systeme-d.com/BRADA_HET_RAPPORT_20160126_JR.pdf
- Original calculator: https://archimath.systeme-d.com/
